title: General doubt regarding documents to be taken for counselling
content:
Ill keep it short
I just recieved my 2nd exam marks ( puc ), and ive entered the best of 2 marks out of 2 exams
but i do not have the marks sheet of it, what should I do?


thanks in advance

comments.body: Carry the temporary id card(download from the website). If you take admission you can submit the original marks card after you get it
i have the temporary id card which was given to me on the day of exam

that should be fine or if you have Internet copy of 12th marks card. Basically a screenshot or pdf of the marks card if you saved it while checking your marks. If the website to check marks is still available login and download/screenshot your marks card
